title: Question on Lord Mordekaisers VFX
body: Will that skin be 'completed' next patch or will it stay like that with the green and purple particles?

replies.body: It needs to be finished. It looks really bad. They also need to remove the lingering green particles from Infernal and pentakill Morde.

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=592EH6og,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-06-13T21:42:29.248+0000)
>
> It needs to be finished. It looks really bad. They also need to remove the lingering green particles from Infernal and pentakill Morde.

^^^^^^^^ sooo much, it's really weird seeing green mixed with orange/red when you E
THIS. Please riot. Lord Morde is more expensive than infernal and it looks SO bad. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE. I legit would rebuy this skin if it was able to get its old effects.
